name: De'Vine: The Card Battles
description:
A very fun and strategic CARD BATTLE game with over 300+ unique cards to collect!
Many battles that also include boss battles for extra depth and entertainment.

Set forty years after the events of the last Dark Hero: Kuan, the world is at peace.
That is until the cards which were used to trap the essences of monsters start losing their enchantment.
Causing the seal to dissipate. Monsters start becoming unhinged and it is up to a very skilled card master
to track down the source of this evil and put an end to it!
